column4: if I backup my home directory, and install ubuntu 64, and then unzip my home directory on the new ubuntu's home dir, what can I expect to happen?
you will have the same personal desktop you had to begin with
Do I need to keep the same username?
the user id (1000 by default for the first) is what is stored, not the name. If you user id is 1000 ( grep <yourusername> /etc/passwd will tell you) whatever username you chose will be the new one
